Write-Up Text: People across Australia are buzzing about the recent Federal Budget which will bring relief to many citizens. One of the most significant provisions is the increase in Commonwealth Rent Assistance by 15% which will provide renters in the private and community markets with an extra $31 per fortnight. Additionally the budget includes childcare subsidies energy bill relief improved healthcare measures and extended family benefits for single parents. The budget has received praise with people thanking the government for listening to their needs and offering much-needed financial aid.
